name: Build and deploy ASP.NET Core API to Azure Web App

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
  workflow_dispatch:

env:
  AZURE_WEBAPP_NAME: secureadmin-api
  AZURE_WEBAPP_PACKAGE_PATH: 'SecureAdmin.Api'
  DOTNET_VERSION: '7.0.x'

permissions:
  contents: read

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup .NET
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
        with:
          dotnet-version: ${{ env.DOTNET_VERSION }}

      - name: Restore dependencies
        run: dotnet restore SecureAdmin.Api/SecureAdmin.Api.csproj

      - name: Build
        run: dotnet build SecureAdmin.Api/SecureAdmin.Api.csproj --configuration Release --no-restore

      - name: Publish
        run: dotnet publish SecureAdmin.Api/SecureAdmin.Api.csproj -c Release -o ./publish

      - name: Deploy to Azure Web App
        uses: azure/webapps-deploy@v3
        with:
          app-name: ${{ env.AZURE_WEBAPP_NAME }}
          publish-profile: ${{ secrets.AZURE_WEBAPP_PUBLISH_PROFILE }}
          package: ./publish
